text: The Insurance is a functional constituency in the elections for the Legislative Council of Hong Kong first created in 1998. It was created from the Financial, Insurance and Real Estate Services which composed of all the voters with the occupation of finance, insurance, real estate services under the then Governor Chris Patten's enlargement of the new nine functional constituency in 1995. The constituency is now restricted to only 144 insurers.http://clic.org.hk/hk/legis/en/ord/542/s20c.html ==References== Category:Functional constituencies of Hong Kong
title: Insurance (constituency)
